front.title: Forward and Reverse HTTP/3 over WebTransport

abstract.t: HTTP/3 was initially specified only for use with the QUIC version 1 transport protocol. This specification defines how to use HTTP/3 over a WebTransport session, which can be implemented using any WebTransport protocol. This enables operation of HTTP/3 when UDP based transport is not available, as well as server-initiated HTTP/3 requests.
